text: Tomalokara ki haâ€™la ye, tomaloke allahara pathata yud'dha nakaraa, athaca nihsahaya nara-narai arau sisusakale e'i buli praarthana karai ache ye, â€˜he amara raba! Amaka e'i janapadara paraa ud'dhara karaa iyara adhibasisakala yalima; tomara phalara paraa amara babe ejana abhibharaka nirdharana karaa arau tomara phalara paraa amara babe ejana sahayakarai nirdharana karaa
